我十分熱愛這遊戲，也沒有在雲，一直陸陸續續地在遊玩，在一代前幾季也爬到宗師，一同參與遊戲興敗的全程，這遊戲在我腦海中的美好回憶裡也佔據了一席之地。

目前的台服大師場開始有大量的中國作弊玩家，都使用麥卡利、艾希、奪命女，他們會戰節奏和技能交換的概念極差，且都是使用"高級掛"，(會自瞄至一定的半徑內，剩下的距離再經由使用者自己瞄準)。
如果你有大概了解它運作的過程一定曉得，不可能經由人工審核，因為即使0.25倍觀看也極難裁定，而遊戲免費也讓使用外掛的成本降低許多。

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

我有個美好的夢
沒有取消線下賽的爆雪
沒有一個只覬覦OWL贊助商覽叫、干預開發的CEO
沒有急著榨取回收利益的投資人
一個完全不懂遊戲的權貴生意人只求利潤，瘋狂壓榨品牌價值，不斷地向開發團隊下指導棋

社群萎靡、性騷擾事件、平衡古怪...等等真的是主要原因?
又或者是某個BOBY老兄只想完成自己的人生事業成就OWL，塑造美好願景與版圖來吸引贊助金主與簽約加盟金，拖垮整體部門產值的罪魁禍首。

這3年來的作為讓鬥陣特工變成沒有浪漫沒有靈魂的賺錢機器，經營手法更像個殺雞取卵的手機遊戲，沒有靈魂 沒有長遠規劃 世界觀不再被仔細塑造 ，多的就是那些該死的電子妓女付費造型與通付費行證。

傻逼暴雪，我草你妈的酬宾！！！！
日你妈！！！退钱！！！！！！
你妈！
什么时候！！
死！！
啊！！！！

[b] Please don't buy anything in that Over-SHOP update... sorry, Over-promises ... I mean game xD [/b]

As an avid gamer of the original Overwatch (1), I had high hopes and expectations for Overwatch 2. Unfortunately, based on my first impressions, I have to admit that the developers didn't manage to live up to my expectations. Overwatch 2 feels like a missed opportunity for innovation and real evolution of the franchise!
你说得对，Over Watch是一款广受好评的团队射击游戏，可你什么时候把我的国服数据还给我？
考迪克什么时候思啊。求求你了。这对我真的很重要
靠迪克你微软爸爸还没把你🐎薄纱呢？
Overwatch > Overwatch 2

you want me to buy the battlepass premium for $15, roughly $14 for the new heroes i didnt unlock through buying the battlepass, $10 or more for a skin for a single hero, and $25 for three pve missions? is the $25 actually for just 3 missions?? its not clear at all, i was promised like 20, and all heros being playable on the pve missions. i'd pay $25 for that, not for what we have now.

sure i could spend 100 hours trying to win matches to unlock heroes that will help me better synergize with my team to further win more matches, but new overwatch players will be locked out of half the roster and will be screamed at for not being able to pick a meta hero or a hero that does better with the rest of the team, because the entire playerbase and game is focused on winning (more xp, completing challenges/dailies) to earn things, take for example, unlocking all heros requires that you win, now imagine you go up against people who already have every hero and can counter all your heros and you cant do anything, because this is a glorified rock paper scissors game and you dont have enough hands.
NOW imagine the people being conned into paying money to unlock these heros because of this scummy practice.

i have 409 hours playing this game, ive played 2,965 matches, and i am absolutely disappointed at how far overwatch has fallen. every corner of overwatch 2 can only be viewed if you first hand blizzard your wallet.

also, nothing of significance makes this a sequel, it is just a bastardised overwatch 1, two less players in matches, thats the only difference that hasnt already happened in the first overwatch. hell, even the story missions were already a thing, called archives.

yeah i'm gonna rip this game into bits because as someone who started in ow1 season 5 I watched as this game turned into a unfettered pile of dog shit.

For one the shop is the only thing that had real effort put into it and it makes me question why even make this a part 2, what was wrong with the first game? well simple loot boxes was easy to grind and ActiBilzz wanted more money like the greedy prostitute they are charging 30 dollars for a 10 second tease.

After the shit 2.0 update the game has just made wrong move after wrong move as if they tripled down on how much they can nickle and dime their player base at which I'm looking at the core fanbase as 20% alright and 80% super reddit mods. For the most part in comp you'll be in matches where people don't talk that much, however if they do check to see if your winning, If not mute them or be ready to hear people call you shit at the game when A. Their accounts are private so you can't see their rank and B. Your in a low skill lobby. (Silver 1 and lower)

Not that it matters the ranking system is still hot dog shit. You can win five games in a role but the game will throw you in fucking gold 5 (low gold) Or lower and at times before they started trying to fix it, you could lose all 10 games back when it came out here's High plot low diamond fuck it. All because all they did was massively update the game and say it's a whole new game but still used old player data for the comp system.

they gimped the story mode because actiblizz said "We NeEd MoRe CaSh" and the worst part I can't even be that mad at the dev team I know they are likely trying to save this sinking ship of a game that soon the ceo would likely send them down in a fucking poorly made tube just to be crushed to death by the insurmountable presser and stress caused because they probably don't even like the game, I know one of them hates their comp match because it actively makes them mad,"

The game is damn near bankrupted on all fronts, the shop has horrible prices, unlocking content for free takes far too long, hero balancing is still shit for a 6v6 game turned 5 v 5, at this point the porn is keeping OW alive and I don't question it, it has more work put into a 30 second pron video then 2 hours of content.

Bobby Kotick troll doll, sex feen looking ass needs to be fired, Microsoft want a extra win, kick this dude out and tell them to give us the story mode that was advertised to us.

наиграл в эту игру 300+ часов с Battle.net и перекачал эту игру в стим, чтобы сказать КАКАЯ ЭТО ПЛОХАЯ ИГРА В КОТОРОЮ НЕ СОВЕТУЮ НИКОМУ ИГРАТЬ, если, ты, хочешь апнуть нормальное звание, а не сидеть на голде как даун, то тебе придётся столкнуться с самыми отбитыми тимейтами, которых свет видал, а и против тебя будет играть фулл стак из потных жирдяев, которые мать продадут, но выиграют игру, к тому же в этой игре самая даунская система званий, чтобы арнуть ранг тебе надо выиграть 5 игр подряд или проищрать до 2 игр, если ты проиграл 3 и больше, то можешь смело идти нахуй и удалять игру

[h1] A essência do GOTY ainda está lá...[/h1]

[spoiler]+700 horas pré mudança[/spoiler]

Sei que recomendar Overwatch em 2023 é bastante controverso, porém, é inegável que o problema é muito mais pelo que foi prometido e não entregue do que por deficiências de gameplay em si. Pra mim, isso aqui é o ápice dos fps e NADA se comparou a diversão, engajamento e competitividade que o Overwatch original me trouxeram por uns 3 ou 4 anos antes de ter sido realizada a atualização para o 2.

Dito isso, a retirada de loot boxes foi para mim, na verdade um problema, já que não acho o esquema de passe de batalha proveitoso ou muito menos justo, antes, as moedas proporcionavam que você comprasse a skin que quisesse, mesmo sem precisar jogar por horas a fim para completar níveis infinitos... mesmo sem precisar gastar 1 centavo além da compra do jogo.

Falando do que temos em mãos hoje: ainda existe MUITO potencial para ser entregue nos modos PvE e eu pretendo dar uma chance a "Invasion" e as próximas expansões, já que comprando as mesmas também se obtém as moedas necessárias para o passe de batalha(here we go agaaaaaaain).

O Competitivo, no entanto, na minha humilde opinião, PRECISA de algum tipo de rework pois a toxicidade está mais alta do que já vi em qualquer jogo(e olha que eu jogo FIFA Ultimate Team), boa sorte aos novos players aderidos junto a Steam e ao fator Free to Play, em alguns momentos, o chat se torna um simulador de xingamentos gratuitos e infundados profanados por crianças que se acham melhores por ter pontuado mais em determinado momento do jogo. Preferia o placar antigo e "privado", dando foco em ganhar e não pontuar.

Pontos muito positivos que vieram junto a season de lançamento na steam é a maior quantidade de conteúdo, mais objetivos, mais level ups individuais para cada personagem e modo, possível aumento de playerbase(ouvi um amém?) após os últimos monótonos anos da franquia.

Blizzard, já que agora tudo é "loja", coloca uns itens legais pra gente engajar e comprar? É pedir muito? Só tem item genérico de pacote sem graça, vamos lá...

Resumindo: Overwatch é atualmente um produto estranho, mas por tudo que já fez, ainda tem um resquício de confiança de que a Blizzard pode fazer com que este seja um produto lucrativo e duradouro. 

Lore? Tem!
Gameplay? Tem!
Carisma e nostalgia? tem e muito!

Cuidem bem do meu bebê, por favor <3
